pullRequest.title: Add more OOL test cases
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix: clear OOL cache between runs
Add scenarios for big world v3 for marine with artillery selection testing.
Shows a few bad casualty selections in current code.
Add test case to check heavy bomber technology
Add OOL selection ordering test cases for naval units


Functional Changes

[] New map or map update
[] New Feature
[] Feature update or enhancement
[] Feature Removal
[] Code Cleanup or refactor
[] Configuration Change
[] Problem fix:  
[x] Other: test coverage  
Testing

commit.message:
Add more OOL test cases

- Fix: clear OOL cache between runs
- Add scenarios for big world v3 for marine with artillery selection testing.
  Shows a few bad casualty selections in current code.
- Add test case to check heavy bomber technology
- Add OOL selection ordering test cases for naval units

nodes.bodyText: Worth noting, was surprising to see OOL taken in this order. Am I doing the math wrong perhaps to expect tank to be last in this case?
